overview:
Sandip Patel is the Founder/CEO of BitConfused, a startup that develops simple web products people want.

Current products include CAGE, a dead simple collaboration tool that allows designers to present, manage and approve their work online.

Patel has been named 40 Under 40 by OKCBusiness, Achievers Under 40 by Journal Record, and awarded Innovator of the Year by Journal Record. Patel has been a guest lecturer and speaker at Oklahoma State University, University of Central Oklahoma, Pratt Institute, and School of Visual Arts.

Prior to BitConfused, Patel was Chief Operating Officer for a leading developer of online video-based training for the media and entertainment industry. Patel has worked with companies ranging from Pixar and LucasFilm, to Autodesk and Nike.
